title: Language Learning Project Utilizing VR-Based Guided Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An intensive evening/weekend course for working professionals, with a shared VR equipment utilization system

learning_goals: Learners can implement basic communicative expressions in the target language with 80% accuracy using guided exploration strategies in VR environments.
Learners can understand linguistic and cultural contexts through VR-based projects and perform role-play simulations at least three times.
Learners complete language project deliverables incorporating peer feedback using collaborative tools.

resources: VR Scenario Kit for Language Learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
